Topic.Title: New to Textadventures - Emmanuel Katto Uganda

Posts.EditableText:
Hello everyone, My name is Emmanuel Katto. I just joined this community. What tools and resources do you recommend for someone just getting started with creating text-based adventures? Any beginner-friendly tutorials?

Thanks in advance!
Emmanuel Katto
Posts.HTML:
Hello everyone, My name is Emmanuel Katto. I just joined this community. What tools and resources do you recommend for someone just getting started with creating text-based adventures? Any beginner-friendly tutorials?

Thanks in advance!
Emmanuel Katto

Posts.EditableText:
I learned a lot from
 Code quest 
https://www.youtube.com/@CodeQuest1
And from the Quest forums and pages. The best lessons I ever got I got by asking specific questions, about scripts I imagined but didn't know how to write, in the quest forums.  You can learn what can be done by playing the games.
